      • newFSDirectory

        public static FSDirectory newFSDirectory(Class<? extends FSDirectory> clazz,
                         Path path)
                                  throws ReflectiveOperationException
        Creates a new specific FSDirectory instance
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class of the object to be created
        path - The file to be used as parameter constructor
        Returns:
        The new FSDirectory instance
        Throws:
        NoSuchMethodException - If the Directory does not have a constructor that takes Path.
        InstantiationException - If the class is abstract or an interface.
        IllegalAccessException - If the constructor does not have public visibility.
        InvocationTargetException - If the constructor throws an exception
        ReflectiveOperationException
